trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_SEQ_00<tab>Ganu Vali is looking to the skies with a smoldering gaze.

TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_SEQ_01<tab>Ganu Vali tells you of the troublesome Vundu nestlings that are bullying young Zundu tribe members. Take away the Vundu bullies' wings by slaying three of their sanuwa Vundu.
TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_SEQ_02<tab>You have laid low the sanuwa Vundu, and have hopefully given the Vundu bullies something to think about. Return now to Ganu Vali and tell him the good news.
TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_SEQ_03<tab>You have reported your victory to Ganu Vali. It appears as though the Vundu nestlings are not happy that you have taken away their options for mobility.
TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_GANUVALI_000_000<tab>Brazen Vundu tribe goes too far! Nestlings of Ok' Zundu suffer under violent storms of abuse!
TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_GANUVALI_000_001<tab>Netherling defends nestlings of Ok' Zundu, helps scatter Vundu tormentors to the wind. However, netherling must not attack Vundu directly!
TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_GANUVALI_000_002<tab>Like all Vanu, Vundu ride wings of sanuwa Vundu. Slay three and Vundu lose wings to torment Zundu nestlings from.
TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_GANUVALI_000_010<tab>Without sanuwa Vundu, Vundu miscreants no longer bully Zundu nestlings. Strike them down like forked lightning.
TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_GANUVALI_000_020<tab>Netherling rains wrath upon sanuwa, throws Vundu into chaos! The nestlings of Zundu thank you!
TEXT_HEAVNZ709_01913_GANUVALI_000_021<tab>Vundu wrath stays calm for some time, gives nestlings much-needed respite. May zephyr winds guide netherling among tribe!
